name: Sticker Shop
Description: Redux project where I learned how to build and manage STORE state for an e-commerce site.

name: Facebook Clone
Description: Functional Facebook Clone built for a class project. Functionalities include adding and deleting friends, customizable profile and the ability to post

name: Twitter/X Clone
Description: Built a function Twitter/X Clone for a class project. Functionalities include: following/unfollowing accounts, customizable profile, 'like' functionality and text posting

name: Airline Ticketing Program
Description: Built a CRUD ticketing system for faux airline company where users could purchase and customize their flights
